hero.title: Empowering Traditional Professions
hero.subtitle: Building markets and inclusivity for the working class

about.title: Our Mission
about.description: We create tech solutions that truly serve the working class. Our focus is on building apps that provide markets for vulnerable traditional professions and make them inclusive. We believe in technology that empowers everyone, not just the corporates.

services.title: Our Services
services.service1: Market Access: Providing digital platforms for traditional professions.
services.service2: Support & Training: Offering technical support and training for digital tools.
services.service3: Community Building: Connecting professionals and fostering community growth.
services.service4: Advocacy: Promoting the rights and interests of traditional professions.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1: Contact Us: Reach out via phone, email, or our online form.
howItWorks.step2: Schedule a Session: Choose a convenient time for your tech help session.
howItWorks.step3: Get Assistance: Receive personalized help from our friendly experts.
howItWorks.step4: Follow Up: We follow up to ensure your tech issues are resolved and you're satisfied.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.quote1: This service has transformed my small business by connecting me to new customers and opportunities.

form.title: Volunteer Registration
form.name: Name
form.consent: I consent to give my data
form.contribution: How would you like to contribute?

form.title: Submit a Suggestion
form.name: Name
form.description: We are seeking your suggestions for traditional professions that are most affected by technology. Please consider factors such as gender, region, caste, and class when listing the professions.
